website_summaries.verdict: This 12-ounce stemless glass and accompanying lid makes it easy to enjoy beverages on the go, or in the comfort of your home.
pros: BPA-free insulated glasses remain cool to touch, even when holding hot liquids
Available in many colors and a glossy or matte finish to suit every style
Keeps drinks cold for up to 9 hours and warm for 3
cons: Must be hand washed rather than put in dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: Poorly cut vinyl
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with vinyl placement. It's clearly jagged on both cups.
customer_reviews.author: leti's phone

customer_reviews.title: Lid leaks
customer_reviews.text: I like the tumbler because it can keep drinks cold but the lid is only good for keeping stuff from falling in your drink. You should use a straw because when you try to drink from the lid, it leaks. It leaked from the first use and had only been hand washed.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Sadly- damaged and low quality!
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to get this- had my personalization plans all laid out. Then I opened it. The colored covering was cut wrong and had some weird blue plastic on there. There was also pinhole damage on the mint exterior. Returning it for a different brand 😟.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, better off paying a little more for a better made product. The color is a plastic material that is not even put on well. Mine came frayed and scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Karson Kern

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality cups. I ordered two as a gift and had initials added. They turned out wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Weiler

customer_reviews.title: Functions well
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I do love this cup. It’s much bigger than my hydro flask. It keeps cold drinks cold and hot drinks hot. Comfy to hold. Nice lid. Super tight seal! It’s the no lip that I don’t love. As in, when you go to take a drink and there’s nothing for your own bottom lip to lean on or push against. So it feels like you’re going to spill or dribble. It just feels odd. My husband took a drink and said it feels wrong and he’d never use it with the lid for that reason. It is functional. And I do love it. It’s just.. odd with the lid on
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have other brands of this same tumbler, so I was skeptical at first. I am very satisfied with my tumblers, especially the price and choice of colors. I like the lids better than some because it has a bigger lip and is easy to get off. It seals nicely and doesn't leak. The drink hole doesn't have a closure, but that is as described. There are no indentions like some other brands, but they are easy to hold. I think the only thing they could improve would be a padded bottom like some others so they don't slip. Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.author: K. Clair

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy again due to the lid
customer_reviews.text: This should have been the best cup ever. But I didn’t realize up until I bought 4 of them that the lid is not completely sealed. It has a hole in it. So the whole keep your drinks hot is not as expected. It does keep my coffee hot for very long time, but not as cited. Maybe y the lid had was different ... there are other options that work better If you don’t mind the hole in the lid then is for you
customer_reviews.author: Eudanis Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Well, I got this to drink wine out of and I was excited to have a lid and not worry as much about spilling. I didn’t use the lid for long, because it’s not really on there tight. It’s secure, but when you drink from it, you kinda have to suck the liquid so it’s not a clean drink. Lol. Does that even make sense!?!? Anyway - I’m disappointed. It’s cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Francheska

customer_reviews.title: Fabous sassy tumber. great hot or cold!
customer_reviews.text: bought two, love it! gave one away to my sister as a gift and she uses hers all the time as well. On vaca used for coffee in morning and cocktails in the afternoon. Only drawback is it doesn't fit well in my car cup holder (Camry) but did fit well in a larger cup holder in an SUV. bought the pink and coral and both colors are fabulous. Used it on a plane and the stewardess took a pic of the bottom and ordered two white ones for herself after we landed. I just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Auntiem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the matte black and love the clean, cool look of it. I also love the size of this tumbler! It holds the perfect amount of coffee for my morning and really does keep it warm for hours. Excited to also use this to sip wine out of while I watch shows in bed! Would totally recommend this for a stocking stuffer or White Elephant gift this holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Tee

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a stickler when it comes to keeping my coffee hot and this cup is AMAZING! I’m a mom who has to reheat my coffee 100 X a day with 2 little ones and this cup eliminated that for me. I am so impressed with the quality, color and price. Coffee in the morning and wine at night ;P I actually ordered another color for myself and 2 more for two of my mommy friends!!!
customer_reviews.author: K-Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel if you're a glass snob like me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a work travel trip as I wanted my own glass to have my wine or drinks in. I'm quiet pleased with this stemless glass. It's much bigger than I thought it would be. It holds ice well (love my evening screwdriver). Id definitely buy this glass again. It makes me happy knowing I dont have to drink from a paper cup in my hotel room.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent water glass
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glass. I love stainless steel drinking vessels. They keep hot drinks hotter and cold ones colder, and things just taste better. I have a 20 oz stainless tumbler that I drink coffee out of every morning and got this glass for drinking water. I wouldn't mind if it was just a little bigger but it works fine, and is compact so I can pack it and take it with me when I travel. Fair price and nice design. For wine, I purchased a pair of similar glasses that have stems.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Shinder

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this cup for my daughter and I added a vinyl sticker to personalize it. The picture doesn't do this cup any justice for it is absolutely beautifully made and keeps her drink cold and just the perfect size. I'm thinking about getting some and giving them out for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Love this little tumbler, I normally take a large yeti rambler this same color to work with me but since I’ve been working from home I’ve been drinking my coffee one cup at a time & this was perfect & matches my collection. I will say the area where you sip from is just a little weird & feels like the lid doesn’t quite seal completely, I can blow air through it however my coffee hasn’t come through yet so it’s still a thumbs up for me.
customer_reviews.author: MCash

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product for Perfect Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these to see if I would like them and I wish I had bought 8 from the start. They come in a great selection of colors, I got the mint color and they are amazing. They keep your drink super cold or hot depending on what you drink. I used mine with wine and coffee and they both hold the temperature for a very long time. I also love how easy they clean. I would recommend this product highly since it met all the qualifications it noted on the information.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work great for coffee
customer_reviews.text: I know these are for wine, but they work great for coffee. I hate CD coffee and this cup keeps it hot. Easy to clean and good looking. Only thing is, I don't like the lids. Sort of want to dribble and they won't fit in most car drink holders. I jut don't use the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! HOT coffee for Mom at last!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two - one for my husband and one for me. My husband told me he preferred regular mag, but I think it is his loss and my gain. I'm a mom of 17m old and, since I had him, I had never been able to drink a hot coffee in the morning (it was always ice-cold-coffee by the time I get to it) until I found this tumbler! Now I get to enjoy my hot coffee every morning!! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: The Reed

customer_reviews.title: To many imperfections
customer_reviews.text: There is a rough ridge that goes all the way around the cup that separates the silver rim and the color of the cup. There were also raised bumps under the paint color of the cup. To many imperfections for 1 item, very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved this!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because it was cheap~I give a couple of expensive gifts to my adult daughter and then a lot of little inexpensive ones to place under the tree, just for fun and for a feeling that she is getting lots of things. This was purchased as one of the inexpensive gifts. Well, it turned out that she already had this type of cup and loved it, but the one she had came without a lid. So, she was gleeful when she saw my gift! I think this was the best gift she got from me this season. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mary A. Kranz

customer_reviews.title: Love these... I'm now looking for short stainless steel straws
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on a lightning deal and love the tumblers. I purchased 3 different colors and they are perfect for my home. I picked up some stainless steel straws and they work fine but shorter straws would be ideal. Others come with stainless steel straws. I have ordered the others with straws for my Auntie who has tile flooring and a pool. The shorter straws made the gift much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT use in outside in the sun
customer_reviews.text: If you plan to use these indoors...then no issue. But, if you plan to sit outside to enjoy a cold drink in these cups, you will have a hard time holding them. They get super HOT in the sun. Their exterior is metal and get HOT fast in the sun. So forget about hanging on the deck with a cup of wine... Total disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ward

customer_reviews.title: They both loved walking down the beach with their cups
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought two of these cups for her and sisters much needed mommy vacation at the beach for the weekend. They only used for cold drinks. Their ice lasted and their drinks stayed cold. They both loved walking down the beach with their cups.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. Carlberg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tumbler
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of the "Maars Bev Stainless Steel Stemless Wine Glass Tumbler with Lid, Vacuum Insulated 12 oz" - one for myself and one as a gift. I ordered them in seafoam and matcha. They are of great quality, look great, and I can't wait to use mine during the summer while sitting outside. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great shape and it works
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Hot coffee or iced, these work. It’s also fun to look like you have a wine glass at work in meetings! Ignore the comments about the lid. Come on now people, you know you have to wash the dang lid. There is no leakage, and if you over fill the top design keeps it on top of the lid,
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cobet

customer_reviews.title: Great tumbler, but not portable.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tumbler; my only qualms are that it isn't sealable, and it doesn't fit cop holders. The lid just has a hole in it you can drink from. There's no option to seal it when you're not driving. It's really best for at home and not traveling. I have a puddle of coffee in my car to arrest to that. I'll keep this for around the house, but I'll be purchasing something more travel friendly in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I've used my tumbler all summer! Keeps my wine cold even in the hottest of temperatures. Pretty durable but the color did scratch while camping and dropping on the rocks (which is totally to be expected) Warning! it's great for hot liquids too but be careful cuz they will stay hot FOREVER and you can easily burn your mouth if you forget that!! I bought one for all my friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: keeps my drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: I love how cold my drinks are now that I have these cups. They're perfect size for a cocktail and love sipping out of the plastic so I don't spill. Great color options, great price. Love the value and would buy again. I have the gold colors and they're really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and leaks
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, lid leaks when trying to drink from it, very, very poor quality compared to yeti and rtic brands. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom2

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great for hot or cold.
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite travel cup. They are really well-made, keep drinks warm or cold for a really long time, and are beautifully designed. I have bought several now for myself and given them as gifts and everyone I’ve given them to loves them as much as I do. The one drawback is they won’t fit in cupholders in the car, but I use them At home and have one at my office as well.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: the cup is nice but the lid sucks
customer_reviews.text: the acrylic lid cracked after a short 3 foot fall onto a wood floor, the rubber gasket quickly turned brown and is hard to clean. the cup is nice and still useable but the lid is trash
customer_reviews.author: Cama

customer_reviews.title: I need more of them!
customer_reviews.text: Being a mom of a newborn and a toddler I would find myself pouring a glass of wine into a normal glass but getting busy and forgetting about it and the wine would go warm by the time I remembered. This tumbler is perfect because when I finally remember I have a glass of wine waiting for me it’s still cold and delicious. Also the cup super cute!
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL

customer_reviews.title: Great and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to originally decorate with my Cricut machine and use for our vino, but ended up using it for water and coffee too. Bought the long skinny tumbler made by this company before and really like their products, which is why I ordered them again. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like the appearance of this cup, but I was disappointed by the quality. It had a very big dent when I accidentally drop the cup. Well, if you are a very careful person, I would recommend you since it looks good. However, if you are not, I will not recommend you purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: A bit too small but works great
customer_reviews.text: I didnt research this enough and it was an impulse buy. The only issue I have with the item is its size. It is way too small. Better research would probably allowed a slightly larger cup. Other than that it works fine. No condensation on the outside with iced/cold drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Bellworx

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these to take on a cruise to hopefully keep our drinks from becoming watered down after just a few minutes. They did their job. I only wish I had them on prior cruises. I was so impressed that I will buy two of the coffee cups to take on the next cruise. Price is very reasonable also. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The Stainless Steel Stemless Wine Glass Tumbler arrived right on time. The colors are very close to the item displayed in the ad. The tumbler kept coffee hot for nearly 4 hours. The tumbled kept a cold beverage for about the same time. I wish the top had a way to close the hole so it was spill proof. I will buy more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Scott

customer_reviews.title: My coffee stayed HOT for over 4 hours and stayed ...
customer_reviews.text: My coffee stayed HOT for over 4 hours and stayed warm for over 6 hours...definitely worth it! The only thing is I wish it could fit in the cup holders in my car, but the bottom is too big
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my cocktails cold
customer_reviews.text: I was using a traditional glass lowball for my cocktails but they sweat and didn't keep the drink cold for very long. I switched to this insulated cup and now my drinks are always cold and never sweat. I took off a star since it is not dishwasher safe, and being lazy, putting dishes in the dishwasher is kinda my thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jiraf27

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for camping and/or home. The colors are nearly exact to my expectations. They keep wine and other beverages cool and are very light and easy to hold. The only thing that would make it better for outdoors is to have a flip opening on the lid. It's open, so if you're not minding your drink a bee could wander in.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: I’ll buy more...good quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift (see tMj cup in photo) it was 1/2 the price of my cup (DK) and it appeared to work very well. There’s a high likelihood I’ll buy more of these to personalize (used my Cricut) as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Kucera

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups! I got the matte version and it’s very easy to hold and can be placed on the top rack of the dishwasher. So cleaning is a breeze. Highly recommend. Probably won’t last as long as a Yeti/etc. but I’m very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size !
customer_reviews.text: I got this actually just for drinking coffee and mate at work and i love it. Whatever hot beverage you have keeps it hot for a long time. Super easy to clean and doesn’t keep odors. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matias

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: So pretty but doesn’t keep drinks cold for long and lid doesn’t close so it leaks if it tips over
customer_reviews.author: Diane Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It has a very secure lid on it so I'm not afraid that it will come off if knocked over but can still spill from the drinking spot. Color came exactly as expected. Has kept my drinks cold for hours without ice. I love using it now more then my Walmart brand yeti cups. Size is exactly as listed. Does say it is top rack dishwasher safe and can be used for hot and cold drinks, I have yet to try the dishwasher or hot drinks in it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Sims

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These have thinner “walls” than the yeti tumbler but the outer coating is tough and should hold up to outdoor use. I love the fact that these have lids. No sliding closure but not concerned since these were an absolute bargain for the set.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: If you’re going to get this, ensure you get one with a straw as it is much better to drink from. I was gifted one with a straw and really came to appreciate how much less dripping and capturing of wine occurs at the top of the glass. As for the original one I bought, I dropped it and it dented within an hour of me opening the package... there’s hard feelings I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Cat-proof
customer_reviews.text: After losing 4 water glasses in 3 weeks to my cat, who casually sweeps them off my nightstand to make sure gravity still works in the pre-dawn hours, I bought this indestructible metal vessel. He knocked it to the ground once and stared at it a little sadly as it failed to shatter pleasingly, and has let it be ever since. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: C. B,

customer_reviews.title: Wine by the pool
customer_reviews.text: We love these! There are great for a glass of wine next to or in the pool. The lid stops the wine from getting out and the water from getting in. The glass is more stable that a wine glass with a stem so there are fewer spills. With the steel Tumbler's I don't have to worry about glass in the pool. My Wife loves the assortment of colors, everyone at the party can have their own color so they can keep track of their own glass.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great tumbler. I drink water, iced tea etc out of it with ice cubes in its the drink stays cold forever. The downside is that this is a tumbler so it’s just an odd shape and sometimes slips down my hand if I don’t hold on tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: leak proof
customer_reviews.text: I like it that I can put the wine in this glass and it keeps it cool, and I can walk around with it without the fear to break it or spill it. I've been in a cast in my foot and I needed something like this to drink, and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Piscis

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our picnic backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I love the pearl color of this stainless steel cup. We bought two to replace the cheap plastic glasses that came in our picnic backpack. These are unbreakable, do a great job of insulating wine and are a perfect match to our picnic set. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: M. Lenoir

customer_reviews.title: Perfection in Stainless!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my new hair salon to serve various beverages to my clients. They’re Effect because they keep coffee hot, tea cold - and they’re extremely easy to wash! The color is perfect, too!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry A. Clapper

customer_reviews.title: Love it ! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Keeps my coffee hot and my smoothie cold. Perfect size for me. I have seen bigger ones but I don't like them. Must buy these! Perfect for cocktail drinks as well so it keeps the ice for longer.
customer_reviews.author: ymillyg

customer_reviews.title: Wine Glass/Tumbler
customer_reviews.text: This glass is both attractive and functional. I have not used the glass for wine but have for iced drinks and water; it retains temperature and is a convenient and useful. Have not yet tried for hot drinks or wine but expect good results.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to drink wine in as we are living in the south now and wanted something to keep my wine chilled in. Love how these are holding up nicely. They clean easily and are holding up after several glasses of wine, lol. I bought the peach ones and will most likely buy another set a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Non-tippable, pretty, and holds just enough wine
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for outdoor dining once my plastic wine glass tipped over in the grass. These have lids and are resistant to tipping over. Very pretty color and definitely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Reliable

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: We bought four and I'm getting ready to order four more. They are very nice, comfortable to hold and great at keeping drinks cold. We use them in our motor home, easy to store and unbreakable.
customer_reviews.author: Millard E Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: The silver looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a gift exchange and boxed with a sphere ice mold and 2 mini liquor bottles. They look of nice quality! I would be happy to receive these as a gift! A vinyl decal would also look nice on the silver.
customer_reviews.author: a.s.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING tumblers
customer_reviews.text: I customize wine tumblers and I love the quality of these. Came in a plastic wrap inside a box to protect the wine tumbler during shipping. I’m not sure about leakproof since it’s for a client but the lid was really sturdy. I will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: aavina

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the coral color, looks more pink than any coral color I have seen. Also recommends to hand wash even though the description says top rack dishwasher safe. Should have stuck with the Yeti...
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups and the price on Amazon is just right - at least the price I paid!!!! My daughter, nieces and sister grabbed onto mine (which was a Christmas gift from a wonderful friend) so I had to order one for each of them! Wish they all came with straws - without extra charge! And, most important of all it does keep things cold for a long time. Haven't tried for hot drinks yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jane W. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. We bought them for our bridal party and they loved them too. They don’t fit in cup holders which is the only thing I didn’t enjoy and my husband said with the lid it didn’t keep things as warm as it could (but I didn’t have a problem). They are nice, inexpensive and great quality. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre insulating properties
customer_reviews.text: Good look and feel, but the actual insulating ability is sub-par compared to other similar thermos cups I’ve had. Keeps coffee warm for maybe 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Rogers

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this cup!! I usually set my cup down and forget about it until it's too cold to drink. This cup doesn't get hot so I could hold it in my lap and the last sip was just as piping hot as the first!! I bought 2 for gifts and they also love them and after checking mine out I need to get another for my boyfriend! I can't wait to use it for wine!! I'm going to use a freezer ball in it so it's ice cold but it doesn't get watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda T

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without an irregularities
customer_reviews.text: I got a little concerned when I saw a few pictures of cups with irregularities, but mine arrived exactly as expected and insulates very well. Perfect for the slow coffee drinker.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great mfor Children
customer_reviews.text: I have found these tumblers to be perfect for after school when the children get home and want something to drink. They keep spills to a minimum and they children really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cute tumblers
customer_reviews.text: I love these little tumblers. I know they are meant to be used for wine but I love using mine for hot teas. It keeps my liquids hot for at least a few hours that way I can enjoy my tea and not have to rush to drink it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Amaya

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved her tumbler.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 2 pack in pink for myself and my daughter. Pink is not my favorite color but it was a very pretty shade of pink. Not one of those annoying shades. Keeps drinks cold for hours. My daughter celebrated her birthday with a beach vacation. She related that everyone wanted her tumbler. She is going to purchase the same tumbler for her best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: keeps things cold
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this insulated cup. I have used it for cold things so far and it works really well keeping things cold for the duration. I love the color, too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: I love these! I looked at many many more expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I looked at many many more expensive versions, but didn't see the point of paying so much for a cup. I'm glad I didn't as these are stylish, keep my drink cold, and have a nice fitting lid to prevent spills. I have taken them to the beach, pool, in my car, on walks... they go everywhere now. I plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: sarah a mccann

customer_reviews.title: Lid Cracked 6 Months After I Bought It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in December. It's June, and I noticed that the lid has started to crack. It also doesn't fit well in a cupholder. Other than that, it keeps my coffee hot for a long time, and it was a good price. Maybe mine was a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Czaplicki

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: Rarely do I write reviews, but I love these little cups SO much I just had to get on here and say WELL DONE! They keep my drink COLD! Seriously.. even outdoors in 95 degree weather! I bought 6 of them to have around the pool, but I love them so much I now use them in the house and are my GO TO cup for anything I drink. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Dori1 Friend

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T COME WITH A STRAW
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 white wine glasses to complete a set of bridesmaid tumblers. I had ordered 6 tumblers directly from Save a Cup but needed 2 more. So I found the same ones here on Amazon and saw pictures with a straw. These did NOT come with a straw! Now I don't know what to do as these tumblers are for a customer and the order must be sent tonight. I am really disappointed since it's not so easy to come around straws for these size cups. BE WARNED!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This cup was a birthday gift for a female friend. She loved it. It's cute, durable, keeps drinks cold, perfect size. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tedford

customer_reviews.title: these cups are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for my husband for his soda habit. He has used nothing else in 7 months! bought several more for all of my kids and more for us, too. the ice doesn't melt, so your drink does not get diluted. It just stays super cold! Also, we use the tops when outside, or when our cat wants to drink our drinks! My son said his beer stayed nice and cold the whole time. I love it for wine, mixed drinks, and even milk. buy these!!
customer_reviews.author: GDW

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased others that were cheaper. Those wound up peeling and really didn’t keep things nearly as cold as these do. If I leave ice and one at night, there is still ice in there in the morning. It definitely keeps beverages cold without the ice melting. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: FB Golfer

customer_reviews.title: Great little cup if you want a rounded profile
customer_reviews.text: Great little mug. I use it for keeping tea hot, and keeping white wine cold without needing to chug. It’s nice and open for getting my hand in to clean, so neither one ends up tasting if the other. The rounded bottom does mean it’s not great in a car cup holder - something I should have realized before tipping hot tea all over the place. The paint has a little chip at the top edge after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Spills easily 😢
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like that the lid doesn’t have a thing to close the part where you drink out of so your drinks spill out easily. Especially if you are on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Ciera Oles

customer_reviews.title: My Wine Stays Cold
customer_reviews.text: I really like these Stemless Wine Glass. I started keeping my glass in the freezer, but you really don't have to. My wine stays cold, I also like that it is not glass so you can have it by the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L. Sturdivant

customer_reviews.title: Cute but leaks
customer_reviews.text: This cup is cute but it leaks through the lid when I drink out of it. I should have spent a little more on a higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: rachel guenther

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: For the same price I bought 2 with straws of the same brand on another site. Think about lowering price.
customer_reviews.author: OMI

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used these as gifts for my sister's bachelorette. I put permanent adhesive vinyl on them and it all lasted through the weekend with lots of handle and drinking. Even later on, at another party, these were still showing up beautifully and durably!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Catron

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Much lighter in weight than the one I bought at Cabela's, but half the price. The lid has an opening for sipping that cannot be closed, so it will leak if knocked over. Still very nice.
customer_reviews.author: big bill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wine Tumblers
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered multiple sets of these insulated wine tumblers; White, Matte Black and the new Rose Gold! Love! I look forward to seeing the new color Marble becoming available for purchase on Amazon because I will be getting that set next!
customer_reviews.author: J Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Serves it's purpose
customer_reviews.text: This cup was bought to put a vinyl decal on. it held up fine with the vinyl, and the cup works the way it should
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: The description of the cup says "powder coated" however the cup seems to vinyl or a similar material. I spent quite a long time looking for the "perfect" cup as I am giving these away as a favor at a baby shower and purchased 30 of them! Needless to say, I am disappointed in the product received and cannot find a number to call in order to understand why the product is different than the description posted.
customer_reviews.author: Primo Beadling

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Practical Tumbler
customer_reviews.text: First of all love the color options available from this seller. It even made it a difficult to decide which one to get because there were a few that I like. Secondly, the product is just as described, it kept my coffee hot for 3 hrs. Keep in mind that your drink is hot because you won’t feel it holding the tumbler, which is what I really like about it. I don’t have to run back to my desk after grabbing a boiling hot cup of tea.
customer_reviews.author: vivinator

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a fun idea!!! Got this one for my husband and a coral one for me! Used them last night to put wine in for a neighborhood BBQ and loved them! Quality is great and absolutely NO leaking which is hard to find these days! Will be ordering more for gifts in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Diebold

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks cold!
customer_reviews.text: This cup does a great job of keeping my wine cold. I really love the color (peach). I haven't used the lid so I can't comment on that but the lip of the cup is great for drinking. I have pretty small hands and i have already dropped it once while trying to pick it up from my coaster. (Spilled on brand new carpet! Yikes!) I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Roland

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash or peel!!
customer_reviews.text: The recommendation for hand washing should be heeded. The black coating did not hold up after a dishwashing cycle.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like a Yeti, but good enough for doing yard work. And pretty colors!
customer_reviews.author: Tooz60

customer_reviews.title: Cute and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I got a two pack, coffee for me and wine for mom. Holds a good amount, stays hot/ cold. I got the pearl color and it's very pretty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for poolside wine
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for Mother's Day. Wife loves them! Great for lounging around the pool with some wine or mixed drinks. It's just the right size for my wife and her friends, a bit small for me but I am used to the 30 oz stainless steel tumblers (also great for around the pool!).
customer_reviews.author: Leaveamark

customer_reviews.title: Splurge on these. You’ll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.text: We are loving these. Taking them from summer into winter and they’re great for both! I’ve tried less expensive brands but they just don’t hold a candle to these.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Wine stays cold for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Best wine glass ever! I always hate when my whites get warm, this glass keeps it cold for at least and hour when indoors. I love being able to take it poolside and not worry about glass breaking and getting in the pool. I ordered 2 in teal and it is close to a “Tiffany Blue” love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tumblers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the midnight colored tumbler and it's awesome. Keeps my coffee hot for several hours, and it's really easy to clean. I really like the lid because it fits nice and tight but also easy to remove. I've been using it at work everyday and definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold - perfect for cold wine
customer_reviews.text: The finish on the sides is perfect, just enough texture that it doesn't slip from your hand, and it keeps wine cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Melugin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for personalization with vinyl!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself to help me drink more water. I wanted to personalize it with a message and the vinyl worked perfect on it. It’s a smooth finish and I will definitely be ordering more! I love how the lid is molded to fit the cup and makes sipping smooth.
customer_reviews.author: M. Woodford

product_meta.title: Maars Bev Stainless Steel Stemless Wine Glass Tumbler with Lid, Vacuum Insulated 12 oz Cup | Spill Proof, Travel Friendly, Fun Cocktail Drinkware - Aqua
feature_bullets: HOT AND COLD: Temperature control feature keeps hot beverages warmer and cold drinks chilled longer. Thermal copper lining keeps hot liquids toasty for 1-3 hours while icy drinks cold for 6-9 hours
MODERN TECHNOLOGY: Double walled and vacuum insulated body is durable, made from premium material, prevents cup sweat and prevents fading and chipping
PERFECT SIZE: Cute and compact body is constructed of lightweight material, is portable, travel friendly, and easy to hold
EASY TO CLEAN: Constructed from 18/8 stainless steel, lead and rust free material is dishwasher safe and easy to wash
VERSATILE USE: Unique and fun design is perfect for all occasions. Great to use at home, office, picnics, parties or given as a gift to friends and family!
